name: A Serious Ball Game
description:
A local competitive game that allows 2-4 players within.

You need to carry a object to destination to get points.The one who has most points wins.But you can use all you can to stop others achieving their goal in the process,including fight.

这是一个本地多人竞争游戏，允许2-4人一起游玩。

你需要把一个物体搬运到终点来得分，最后分数最高的玩家会取得胜利。但你可以使用你所有的手段来阻止别人得分，甚至你们可以打一架。

This game was made for Global Game Jam:https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/serious-ball-game
